content: you run the risk of not having enough yarn to do the second set of stripes if your gauge is off stitches s2kp - slip 2 stitches knitwise at the same time k1 pass the 2 slipped sts over yo - yarn over tbl - through the back loop pattern provisional co 84 sts using main yarn k one round as set up round join in round being careful not to twist stitches round 1 k1 yo k5 sl2kp k5 yo repeat to end round 2 k all k sts knit yo s tbl repeat rnds 1 & 2 until you have worked 12 rnds total break yarn and tie on a new color follow instructions given in the pattern notes above cont as est working 12 rnds per color using every color twice leave a long yarn tail to work kitchener st finishing place provisional sts onto a new needle kitchener st these co sts to the live sts just worked weave in the ends from the kitchener st hand wash lay flat to dry o © 2016 lux adorna knits this pattern cannot be duplicated photocopied or reproduced without the written permission of heidi hennessy of lux adorna knits one copy of this pattern may be made by user for personal use only if you wish to knit this item for resale purposes please contact the designer at info@luxadornaknits com for licensing information lll 11 www luxadornaknits com w w w l u x a d o r n a k n i t s c o m
